thread.title: Incheon International Airport presents 'Fantastic Summer Concert'
thread.title_full: Incheon International Airport presents 'Fantastic Summer Concert'

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Incheon International Airport presents 'Fantastic Summer Concert'
text:
Incheon International Airport presents 'Fantastic Summer Concert' Adv: 
Jul 22, 2015 Adv: 
INCHEON, South Korea - Incheon International Airport presents cultural performance to help travelers beat the heat during this summer vacation season. 
Incheon International Airport’s summer regular performance, ‘Fantastic Summer Concert’, will be held from July 28 to August 2 at Millennium Hall on the first floor of its passenger terminal. 
The concert, which is open to all visitors for free, will be held for about 90 minutes on July 28 at 22:00 p.m., and at 16:00 p.m. on July 29 through August 2. 
On July 28, KBS Cool FM will stage a special live broadcast of ‘Super Junior’s Kiss the Radio’, featuring many popular K-POP singers, including GOT7, CLC, and Seventeen. This emotion-filled concert will create a unique atmosphere of Incheon Airport until midnight. 
On July 29, Singer Lena Park, a ‘fairy of R&B’, who brought excitement to the people in the TV music program of ‘I Am a Singer 3’ will present a special live stage, communicating with the audience with pure and attractive voice. 
On July 30, famed Baritone Kim Dong Gyu and ‘Heart to Heart Orchestra’, a symphony orchestra of music-talented youths with developmental disability, will perform together in beautiful harmony to deliver message of hope and moving experience. 
On July 31, the audience will enjoy exquisite and fresh collaboration of music and paintings. The classic story concert of Insiem Philharmonic Orchestra will move heart of the audience with differentiated genre, showing famous paintings. 
On August 1, Conductor Suh Heetai, the real hero of ‘Beethoven Virus’, a TV drama series, will conduct Millennium Chamber Ensemble to perform beautiful film OSTs. 
A cappella gala concert with beautiful harmony will be held on August 2. The concert will feature members of Children Cultural Center in Asian Culture Complex and a cappella groups, such as Zenith, EXIT and The Present. 
President Park Won-su of Incheon International Airport said “Given that the Incheon Airport is striving to transform into ‘an airport unsleeping around the clock’, we designed the summer regular concert to present cool cultural melodies to visitors at midnight. We will provide colorful cultural programs to the audience at varied times.” 
Meanwhile, the Airport is currently hosting a ‘Facebook Comment Event’ that offers seats for a midnight radio show on July 28 and coupons for free beverages at airport coffee shops.
